sentences.content: Key Message
Seafloor litter is widespread across the area assessed; fisheries-related items and plastic material...
predominate.
The Bay of Biscay and the Iberian Coast had a higher probability of litter collected than both
the Greater North Sea and Celtic Seas.
Conclusion (brief)
Some broad conclusions can be drawn about the spatial and temporal changes in the chance that a haul
contains litter in the Greater North Sea (GNS), Celtic Seas (CS), and Bay of Biscay (BB) and a demon...
study of count data in the Greater North Sea has been carried out.

Conclusion (extended)
On the whole, there needs to be consideration about what seafloor litter data from fishing surveys
demonstrates about the state of the seafloor and whether the data is useful for picking out spatial ...
temporal trends. There is moderate confidence in both the methodology and the data availability.
What we mean by the amount of litter on the seafloor needs to be defined.
